other_tests.findings: Positive with a loss of 29% (normal <10%) of radioiodide accumulated at 2h in the thyroid gland.

other_tests.procedure_name: Restriction enzyme digestion with Dde I
other_tests.findings: Mutation V138F abolishes a recognition site, leaving the 272-bp fragment uncut in homozygotes.
Showed variable hearing reactions between 85 and 100 dB; indicated bilateral profound hearing loss.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Hearing loss was progressive with thresholds at 55 dB on the right side and 80 dB on the left at 4 yr.
